text: József Verebes (23 March 1941 – 13 March 2016) was a Hungarian football manager and player.Gyász: nincs többé mágia, elhunyt Verebes József He was born in Budapest. Verebes played for Ferencvárosi TC from 1961 through 1962. He managed the Hungary national football team in 1987. On 15 October 2010, Verebes became the coach of Nagytétény SE, competing in the Budapest championship. Verebes became the advisor of his former club Rába ETO in 2011. Verebes died in Budapest from complications of a stroke at the age of 74. ==References== Category:1941 births Category:2016 deaths Category:Deaths from stroke Category:Footballers from Budapest Category:Hungarian football managers
title: József Verebes
